dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 56,880 skeleton action sequences and has 60 classes, which can be categorized into daily, healthy, and interactive behaviors. All action data were captured simultaneously by three Microsoft Kinect v2 cameras from different angles.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: This dataset is an incremental dataset of NTU RGB+D, containing 120 classes, 106 subjects, and 114,480 skeleton sequences. Actions were acquired by three cameras, with benchmarks for evaluating model performance.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: J. Wang
X. Nie
Y. Xia
Y. Wu
S. Zhu
dcterms:description: The dataset contains ten basic human actions and 1494 video clips from 10 actors, obtained from three Kinect cameras captured simultaneously. The evaluation protocol uses data from the first two cameras for training and the last camera for testing.
dcterms:title: NW-UCLA
